Config File¶

The key file to controlling the case setup and adjusting parameters of the problem is the config.json. This file contains all parameters needed to adjust such that the running script need not be changed.

Complete Config¶

{
	"case": "PH",
	"test_name": "Template",
	"backend": "v1",
    "iter_list": [10000,500,500,200000],
	"train_steps": [false, true, true],
    "param": [5e-4, 5, 2, "tanh", "Glorot uniform"],
    "colloc": [100, 100, "Hammersley"],
	"PDE"  : "HD",
	"fixedfp": [true, -0.0110],
    "doSA": [true, 1e-10],
    "hardConstraint": true,    
    "massflow": [true, 1000],
    "weight_pde": [1,1,1,1,1],
	"weight_reg": [1e-2],
    "weight_data": [10,10],
    "weight_wall": [2.5,2.5,10,10,10],
    "weight_periodic": [1,1,1,1,1,1],
    "weight_massflow": [1e-1],
    "isSol": false,
    "loadModel":[false,"***/SavedModel/***.ckpt"],
	"loadColloc": false,
    "resolution": "0p5"
}
